level.text: 1217.1 No advertising or advertising device shall be placed on or in any LCSehicle except with the written approval of the Office.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 2812, 2828 (May 20, 1994); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 12394 (August 30, 2013).
